title: An Explainable-AI approach for Diagnosis of COVID-19 using MALDI-ToF Mass Spectrometry. (arXiv:2109.14099v3 [cs.LG] UPDATED)
abstract: The severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus type-2 (SARS-CoV-2) caused a global pandemic and immensely affected the global economy. Accurate, cost-effective, and quick tests have proven substantial in identifying infected people and mitigating the spread. Recently, multiple alternative platforms for testing coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) have been published that show high agreement with current gold standard real-time polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) results. These new methods do away with nasopharyngeal (NP) swabs, eliminate the need for complicated reagents, and reduce the burden on RT-PCR test reagent supply. In the present work, we have designed an artificial intelligence-based (AI) testing method to provide confidence in the results. Current AI applications for COVID-19 studies often lack a biological foundation in the decision-making process, and our AI approach is one of the earliest to leverage explainable AI (X-AI) algorithms for COVID-19 diagnosis using mass spec
context:
Title: An Explainable-AI approach for Diagnosis of COVID-19 using MALDI-ToF Mass Spectrometry. (arXiv:2109.14099v3 [cs.LG] UPDATED)
Abstract: The severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus type-2 (SARS-CoV-2) caused a global pandemic and immensely affected the global economy. Accurate, cost-effective, and quick tests have proven substantial in identifying infected people and mitigating the spread. Recently, multiple alternative platforms for testing coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) have been published that show high agreement with current gold standard real-time polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) results. These new methods do away with nasopharyngeal (NP) swabs, eliminate the need for complicated reagents, and reduce the burden on RT-PCR test reagent supply. In the present work, we have designed an artificial intelligence-based (AI) testing method to provide confidence in the results. Current AI applications for COVID-19 studies often lack a biological foundation in the decision-making process, and our AI approach is one of the earliest to leverage explainable AI (X-AI) algorithms for COVID-19 diagnosis using mass spec
translated_title: 一种可解释的基于 MALDI-ToF 质谱的 COVID-19 诊断 AI 方法
translated_abstract: 严重急性呼吸综合症冠状病毒类型2（SARS-CoV-2）引起了全球大流行，并极大地影响了全球经济。准确、经济实惠且快速的检测方法已被证明对识别感染者和减轻传播起到了重要作用。最近，已经发布了多种另类的检测 COVID-19 的平台，这些平台与当前黄金标准实时聚合酶链反应（RT-PCR）结果具有高度一致性。这些新方法不需要鼻咽拭子（NP），免除了复杂试剂的需要，并减轻了 RT-PCR 试剂的供应负担。在本研究中，我们设计了一种基于人工智能的（AI）检测方法，以提供结果信心。当前 COVID-19 研究中的 AI 应用通常缺乏决策过程中的生物基础，我们的 AI 方法是最早利用可解释的 AI（X-AI）算法进行 COVID-19 诊断的方法之一，使用质谱。
tldr: 本文提出了一种基于可解释AI算法的基于MALDI-ToF质谱的COVID-19诊断方法，以提供准确、经济实惠且快速的COVID-19检测服务。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes an explainable AI-based method for COVID-19 diagnosis using MALDI-ToF mass spectrometry, which provides accurate, cost-effective, and quick COVID-19 testing by leveraging X-AI algorithms.
